item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration mass layoffs at many U.S. agencies
item.description: The Trump administration has already asked the Supreme Court to block an earlier version of the order on efforts to reorganize the federal bureaucracy...

item.title: Trump calls for 50% tariff on European Union starting June 1
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is "recommending a straight 50% Tariff on the European Union" after complaining that trade negotiations have stalled.

item.title: Harvard sues Trump administration over international student enrollment ban
item.description: "Without its international students, Harvard is not Harvard," the lawsuit by the private school against the Trump administration says.

item.title: Trump's 5% NATO spend target 'very, very difficult' to meet, Greek PM says
item.description: Several NATO members currently struggle even with spending 2% of their gross domestic product on defense.
